Hello guys, we decided to offer an grand opening sale to everyone here on LET, We are offering 50% off all of our already low priced KVM servers for the LET community. Just a little bit about ourselves we were recently founded in early August with the goal in mind to provide the most resources at the cheapest possible price. Your resources are dedicated which means you can use as much of any one resource as your would like. CPU and Disk IO are on a fair share basis, if you are found to be hurting the performance for other users on the node we will try to work it out. If a fair conclusion can't be made a refund will be offered for the remainder of the service period.

Our servers are located in the PhoenixNap datacenter in Phoenix, AZ, we looking into expanding into new locations soon with even more powerful servers.

We can also offer any OS you would like simply open a support ticket and we'll set it up for you. Windows is also allowed on a bring your own key basis.

The Nodes contain a minimum Dual Intel Xeon L5520 processors; 4 7200 RPM drives in Raid 10, dual Gigabit Ports, and 32 GB of ram.
